title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\AutoscalingPolicyLoadBalancingUtilization
name: AutoscalingPolicyLoadBalancingUtilization
description:
Configuration parameters of autoscaling based on load balancing.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.AutoscalingPolicyLoadBalancingUtilization

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.utilization_target
params.description: Fraction of backend capacity utilization (set in HTTP(S) load balancing configuration) that the autoscaler maintains. Must be a positive float value. If not defined, the default is 0.8.

methods.description:
